title: Actionable weather warnings with emoji-safe rendering

requirements.summary: Expand and standardize actionable, emoji-inclusive English weather advice for rain/cold/hot conditions.
acceptanceCriteria: When current conditions indicate rain/drizzle/showers, the advice title/message explicitly tells the user to carry an umbrella and includes umbrella-related emoji(s).
When current conditions indicate snow or very cold temperature, the advice title/message explicitly tells the user to wear warm clothes and includes cold/clothing emoji(s).
When current conditions indicate hot temperature, the advice title/message explicitly tells the user to stay hydrated and includes water/heat emoji(s).
All advice/warning copy is in English.

file_operations.description: Update advice generation logic and copy to ensure the user-facing title/message includes the exact actionable phrases “Carry an umbrella”, “Wear warm clothes”, and “Stay hydrated” (as applicable) and includes relevant emojis for rain/cold/hot conditions; keep all copy in English.

requirements.summary: Ensure the advice banner displays full emoji-inclusive titles/messages with readable wrapping in light and dark mode without truncation.
acceptanceCriteria: Advice titles and messages (including emojis) are fully visible and wrap gracefully on mobile and desktop.
No layout regressions in light mode or dark mode when rendering longer advice messages.

file_operations.description: Adjust the AdviceBanner layout/typography to guarantee the title and message render exactly as provided (including emojis) without truncation, using wrapping-friendly styles (e.g., no clamping, appropriate whitespace/overflow/line-height) and ensuring readable contrast in both light and dark mode. Use the shadcn-ui Alert component for the banner container (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
